content.content: This documentation will help you get started with our product quickly and efficiently. Follow the steps below to begin your journey.

npm install our-package
# or
yarn add our-package
After installation, you can import the package in your project:

import { Component } from "our-package";

const app = new Component();
If you're using our API from a .NET application, here's how you can get started:
This is a live graph powered by Desmos. You can modify the equation below to try different formulas.
